name: ✦ ⋆｡ﾟ G R A V I T Y - S W I T C H E R ｡ﾟ ⋆✦
name_original: ✦ ⋆｡ﾟ G R A V I T Y - S W I T C H E R ｡ﾟ ⋆✦
description:
｡ ﾟ ☄️⋆ ｡ ｡ ☁︎  ⋆ ｡ . ﾟ☾ ﾟ  ｡ ⋆  ☁︎ .  ⋆ ｡ .   ﾟ  .  ✦ - . - . / / A B O U T  / / - _. - . ✦             ⋆ .                                                                      ⋆ ☄️  ﾟ ✦ You are an astronaut in space, going about your tasks. Until a rumble sets off the alarms. Aliens have broken in! Traverse your ship to get to your crew, switch the gravity within your ship to avoid the aliens & clear a path. ✦

.

ﾟ ☄️ .  ⋆ ✦ - . - . / / I N S T R U C T I O N S / / - _. - . ✦

.

✦ WASD to move ✦ Space to jump ✦ G to switch gravity

.
